response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering this product to you for $15,000. We understand that such an investment might require careful consideration, but we assure you that it is well worth the price. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 15000}
